text: Nuko ubwo ukuri kuduturutseho (intumwa Muhamadi) kwabageragaho, baravuga bati "Kuki atahawe nk’ibyo Musa yahawe?" (Babwire uti) "Ese mbere (Abayahudi) ntibahakanye ibyo Musa yahawe?" Baravuga bati "Ni uburozi bwombi (Qur’an na Tawurati) bwunganirana". Baranavuga bati "Mu by’ukuri, byose turabihakanye
